archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1062
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer I want to be able to change from a consumer plan to a business plan and vice versa, so that my plan is designed with my needs in mind

properties.value: SC: Conversion to plans from another customer segment is not available in our solution at the moment (other structure of business and private customers) PIM: when you change plan from e.g. individual to business do you also need to update customer data (ususaly consumer and business customer model differs)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
